jobs.title: CTO/Co-Founder
jobs.description:
CTO-Please beware this is not a paid in the short term till we have raised funding which will lead to a permanent job- we are looking to offering equity.
Cloud Trip is an  end-to-end travel management platform, we are focusing on the user experience journey for the business travellers and travel managers. This will happen by   consistently delivering a great experience to travellers and seamless process efficiency.

We are looking for a passionate traveller to join our founding management team as technical co-founder, and be our most senior technical decision maker, responsible for engineering the product, leading the technical aspect of the business and hiring and managing the Tech Team.

As a Technical Co-Founder and CTO, you will get to:

- Own key technological and architectural decisions and work with other co-founders to scale up the company
- Help develop a product and technical roadmap which will then be used to as a blueprint for the build
- Develop and take responsibility for the deployment and delivery of this highly innovative product and scale it from an MVP to a truly world class product
- Work alongside and manage the relationship with other technical agencies and freelancers to help build other aspects of the product
- Hire, manage and set the culture of a team of multi-departmental developers
- Have exposure to fundraising campaigns to help sponsor the business’s capitalisation requirements

Requirements Technical
1.Experienced in building & scaling travel tech businesses or similar services
2.Good working knowledge of developing complex SaaS products
3. Demonstrated track-record of delivering well-engineered products with modern technologies for a variety of different problem domains
4. Worked on a diverse set of full stack technologies including experience with web, mobile, data and infrastructure.
5. Appetite for experimenting with new technologies and tools to drive innovation and creativity
6. 5+ yrs Hands on experience in working with Nodejs, MongoDB, Reactjs and ExpressJs
7. Good working knowledge of at least one programming language apart from Javascript.
8. Working experience in DevOps, managing builds, building CI/CD pipelines and deployment
Leadership
1. Built and led a team before and comfortable being responsible for the welfare and development of other engineers
2. Genuinely enjoys mentoring and coaching engineers to guide their professional, technical and personal development as well as motivating and challenging them to focus on delivering high-quality solutions that match the business requirements of a start-up
3. Managed a technical project, knowing when to apply appropriate project management strategies and how to align a team around an objective
4. Comfortable explaining technical products and systems to unrelated parties

Product Focus
1. Engaged in the product development process in prior roles and has previously delivered and managed a product roadmap with competing customer & technical requirements
2. Experience of knowing when to push for the perfect solution versus a simpler way to move product development forward
3. Ideally experienced in shifting a user experience and gaining customer traction through a personalised and data-rich content approach

Culture/Interpersonal Skills
1. Is motivated to join a start-up as a founding member/co-founder, thrives on uncertainty and is able to get the job done through whatever wacky working schedules make sense for a founding team.
2. Is excited about business building. Has a strong and established technical network and can leverage this network to build the business
3. Genuinely passionate about the travel sector and disrupting the business travel market
4. Strong communication skills - you’ll be sharing the results of analyses, and discussing technical problems, with a variety of technical and non-technical audiences

jobs.title: Partnerships Manager at Cloud Trip
jobs.description:
Partnerships Manager / Business Development Manager / Affiliate Partner Manager we are focusing our travel business across Europe and US markets.

What's in it for you?
Please beware this is not a paid gig in the short term - we are looking to offering equity.
A co-founder position, equity stake, collaborate with an experienced team and base salary upon secured funding.

The Partnerships Manager / Business Development Manager / Affiliate Partner Manager will have the opportunity to own all aspects of the partnership’s strategy.

Partnerships Manager / Business Development Manager / Affiliate Partner Manager will:

Drive all aspects of the partner relationship including business development, enablement, partner marketing and solution development
Take responsibility for bringing on board new partnerships
Scope, identify and prioritise target partners based on market insights
Present and promote the brand’s value proposition and capabilities as a WIN-WIN to partners
Manage all relationship interlocks – executive, product development, marketing, delivery
Partnerships Manager / Business Development Manager / Affiliate Partner Manager must have:

Strong partnerships experience from any industry such as Marketplaces, eCommerce, B2C, FMCG, Travel, Hotels, Airlines, Retail, Car Hire, Car Rental, Holidays, Media, Consumer Goods etc.
Strong negotiation and indirect/ cross-functional stakeholder management skills
Good balance of big picture + implementation rigour
Exposure to sales and marketing funnels, online marketing and marketing analytics
